name: photochemically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves or relates to the effect of light on chemicals: The scientists found a way to make the molecules in the dye react photochemically. We now believe that much of the destruction of the ozone layer has been photochemically driven.
More examplesFewer examplesOxides of sulphur and nitrogen are photochemically oxidized to produce sulphuric acid and nitric acid.The tool contains a series of photochemically etched steel blades.A team of technicians worked to restore the old film part digitally and part photochemically.
